name: 張詠翔
objective:
本課程介紹常用的統計分析方法和主要量化研究方法。課程主要容包括問卷調查法，實驗研究法，相關研究法，抽樣方法，測驗信度與效度，X2 考驗，相關分析，t 考驗，變異數分析，單迴歸，多元迴歸。
The course is designed for graduate students studying in fields related to applied linguistics and education who are interested in using descriptive and inferential statistics to analyze data gathered from major quantitative research designs. The course covers the following topics: overview of quantitative research designs including survey research, experimental and quasi-experimental research, and correlational research; measuring of reliability and validity; sampling, hypothesis testing and statistical significance, correlational analysis, tests of mean differences, tests of frequencies, analysis of variance, linear regression, and multiple regression.
schedule:
Week1-4: statistics 
Week 8-16: statistics in R
materials:
Podesva, Robert J., and Devyani Sharma, eds. Research methods in linguistics. Cambridge University Press, 2014.
Podesva, R. J., & Sharma, D. (Eds.). (2014). Research methods in linguistics. Cambridge University Press.
